narrative.narrative: Air Nunavut is based at Iqaluit in Canada's Nunavut territory in its most extreme north region in the Arctic. It began in 1989 as Air Baffin, which Baffin is the large island Iqaluit lays on. It does charters and MEDEVAC service. It has another base at Oshawa,Ontario. From Oshawa it operates three Dassault Falcon 10's under the name SmoothAir Charter.From Iqaluit it offers charters to Arctic Bay,Cape Dorset,Clyde River,Hall Beach,Igoolik,Mary River, Montreal,Ottawa,Pangnirtung,Pond Inlet,Qikiqtarjuaq,Rankin Inlet,Resolute Bay,and Yellowknife. Its fleet at May 2014 was four Dassault Falcon 10's and three Beechcraft King Air 200's.
